speaker: President.
english:
President. − The next item is the joint debate on
– the report ( A6-0397/2007 ) by Mr Virrankoski, on behalf of the Committee on Budgets, on the draft general budget of the European Union for the financial year 2008, Section III – Commission
(C6-0287/2007 – 2007/2019(BUD) ) and
– the report ( A6-0394/2007 ) by Mr Itälä, on behalf of the Committee on Budgets, on the draft general budget of the European Union for the financial year 2008, Sections I, II, IV, V, VI, VII, VIII and IX
(C6-0288/2007 – 2007/2019(BUD) ).
original:
President. − The next item is the joint debate on
– the report ( A6-0397/2007 ) by Mr Virrankoski, on behalf of the Committee on Budgets, on the draft general budget of the European Union for the financial year 2008, Section III – Commission
(C6-0287/2007 – 2007/2019(BUD) ) and
– the report ( A6-0394/2007 ) by Mr Itälä, on behalf of the Committee on Budgets, on the draft general budget of the European Union for the financial year 2008, Sections I, II, IV, V, VI, VII, VIII and IX
(C6-0288/2007 – 2007/2019(BUD) ).
agenda_item: 2008 draft general budget: Section III – 2008 draft general budget: Sections I, II, IV, V, VI, VII, VIII and IX (debate)
